features: The 4-Stage telescoping body makes Reach compact and portable at only 14'' retracted. Integrated twist locks allow the Reach to be extended up to 40''
SMART REMOTE CLIP: Control your GoPro from your fingertips, perfect for capturing selfies! Use the included remote clip to attach the GoPro Smart Remote
Salt and Fresh Waterproof (will not rust)
Attaches Directly to all GoPro® HERO Cameras: No adapters needed
